Class Bunker

  • java.lang.Object
    • DefaultCritter
      • Enemy
        • Bunker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Critter

    public class Bunker
extends Enemy
    Extends enemy and is a model object for a bunker that is to the enemies advantage, bunkers destroy power ups, have lives and enemy missiles can pass through them.
    Author:
    Bradley Fourie, Heinrich Benz, Daniel Banks
    See Also:
    Enemy

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class DefaultCritter

        radius, xCoord, xVelocity, yCoord, yVelocity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bunker(double xCoord, double yCoord)
      Class constructor that creates a bunker at the specified coordinates, bunkers have default properties a radius of 40, no velocities, 10 lives and no probability of shooting

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onEnemyCollision(Enemy enemy)
      Checks if the bunker has collided with an enemy on the canvas by checking the euclidean distance between the two entities.
      void render() 

      • Methods inherited from class Enemy

        getLives, isShoot, isShooterCollision, moveX, moveY, onMissileCollision, removeLives

      • Methods inherited from class DefaultCritter

        getRadius, getXCoord, getYCoord, setXVelocity, setYVelocity

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bunker

        public Bunker(double xCoord,
              double yCoord)
        Class constructor that creates a bunker at the specified coordinates, bunkers have default properties a radius of 40, no velocities, 10 lives and no probability of shooting
        Parameters:
        xCoord - the x-coordinate of the light enemy
        yCoord - the y-coordinate of the light enemy
        See Also:
        Enemy

    • Method Detail

      • onEnemyCollision

        public boolean onEnemyCollision(Enemy enemy)
        Checks if the bunker has collided with an enemy on the canvas by checking the euclidean distance between the two entities.
        Parameters:
        enemy - the enemy with which the collision is being checked for
        Returns:
        a boolean corresponding to whether or not the two entities have collided.

      • render

        public void render()
